name: Dungeon Sandbox (itch)
description:
Get ready to journey through a maze of dungeons!  Armed with the weapons you will find along the way, be prepared to battle a variety of enemies as you venture to the exit portal.  The possibilities are endless as there are an infinite amount of dungeons you can create!

Customize unique dungeon levels by adding hallways and rooms.  Add torches, weapons, shields, lock doors, traps, and lava to make levels more complex!!!  Choose what enemies will be lurking at various turns.  Create challenging levels that you can share with friends and other players.

This game is in early access.  I am hoping to build a community of supporters who can provide valuable feedback.  With your support, I am hoping to gain insight on what features and improvements can be made to this current project.  If you find any bugs or have any suggestions that can enhance the game, comment down below!  I am open to anything on how to make this game the best that it can be.      

Game Controls

To check your control options for the dungeon creator, click on the help menu.  For the player, press Esc and all of your controls are located in the Pause menu

This game was created using Unity.

Special thanks to all of the Alpha testers that helped get this game to early access!
